name: Web version of Twisty Words mobile game
name_original: Web version of Twisty Words mobile game
description:
Web version of the Android Game Twisty Words 

If you like classic word puzzle games give Twisty Words a try! We've prepared a web version of our mobile game to play when you're away from your Android device. Fans of word games like text twist or word warp will feel right at home with a classic gameplay style and thousands of scrambled words to solve. Also try our Android version for the full mobile experience!

Scoring:

Every letter of every word you find will add to your score. Find the 6 letter word in each puzzle and you'll carry your score into the next round. Keep this going for high scores!

Mouse and Keyboard Controls: Click on or simply type the letters to select and add to your guess. Click on the "Got It" button or hit ENTER on your keyboard to try to guess a word. Click on the lasted letter added, or hit backspace to remove the last letter from your guess. Click on the clue button, or hit the "?" key to use one of your clues. The "Last" button can be clicked, or hit TAB on your keyboard to enter your previous guess and speed up typing. If you're really stuck, clicking the Shuffle button or typing "." will shuffle the letters in the letter tray for a fresh view of the puzzle letters. Hit Escape, or click End Round to end the current puzzle.
